nodes.text: The Syliure-25 hyperdrive module was a hyperdrive docking ring produced by TransGalMeg Industries, Incorporated during the Galactic Civil War and sold for 10,000. It was designed to offer hyperspace travel to starfighters that were too small to allow for an onboard hyperdrive. The engines were fitted with Class 2.0 hyperdrives, connected to a R1 or R2-series astromech droid.
